summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Legal Multi-Agent Courtroom Simulator. Fixed critical JSON parsing bug in judge verdict rendering. All backend APIs and frontend workflows are working correctly.
passed_tests: Case processing with LLM extraction of facts/issues/holding
Multi-agent simulation with 4 AI agents (2 rounds of debate)
Judge verdict with structured reasoning and confidence
Frontend file upload with drag & drop zone
End-to-end workflow from upload to audit
